an9.19:2.3: paccuṭṭhimha abhivādimha → paccuṭṭhimha ca abhivādimha ca (sya-all)
an9.19:3.3: paccuṭṭhimha abhivādimha → paccuṭṭhimha ca abhivādimha ca (sya-all, pts1ed) | āsanaṁ → āsanañca (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
an9.19:4.3: paccuṭṭhimha abhivādimha → paccuṭṭhimha ca abhivādimha ca (sya-all) | āsanaṁ → āsanañca (sya-all) | yathābalaṁ → yathābalaṁ ca (?) | upanisīdimha → upanisīdimha ca (sya-all) | dhammānudhammaṁ → dhammānudhamma (pts1ed); dhammānudhammañca (?)
